headline: Is Dow Inc. (DOW) the Undervalued Chemical Stock to Buy Now?
summary: We recently published a list of 11 Undervalued Chemical Stocks to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) stands against other undervalued chemical stocks to buy now. President Trump is looking to place 25% tariffs on goods from Canada and Mexico and this could negatively […]

headline: DuPont Gains on Productivity & Innovation Amid Pricing Woes

headline: PPG Opens Waterborne Automotive Coatings Plant in Thailand
summary: The facility is expected to boost PPG's local production capacity for waterborne basecoats and primers.

headline: BASF Joins Forestal on Advanced E-Methanol Production Using OASE
summary: BASFY is laying the groundwork for one of the first plants to produce e-methanol using its OASE technology.

headline: Dow and X-energy Submit Construction Permit Application to the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission for Proposed Advanced Nuclear Project in Texas
summary: Dow (NYSE: DOW) and X-Energy Reactor Company, LLC ("X-energy") announced the submission of a construction permit application to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission ("NRC") for a proposed advanced nuclear project in Seadrift, Texas.
